content.raw:
I feel like `ign-launch-plugins` would be more accurate, since that seems to be the common denominator there. Things like the joystick for example don't depend on `ign-gazebo`.

The potential for this circular dependency is one of the reasons I think a design document would help clarify things, I agree with @iche033 that it's not clear when one should write an `ign-launch` plugin or an `ign-gazebo` one and what's their relationship.
content.html:
I feel like ign-launch-plugins would be more accurate, since that seems to be the common denominator there. Things like the joystick for example don't depend on ign-gazebo.

The potential for this circular dependency is one of the reasons I think a design document would help clarify things, I agree with @iche033 that it's not clear when one should write an ign-launch plugin or an ign-gazebo one and what's their relationship.
